title: Facebook Business Page Cover Photo for Charity
snippet:
I am looking to get a professional looking Facebook Business Page Cover Photo created. If we like what you do, we need a new one every 2 months.

It needs to be clean, neat, glossy, high quality. 

Our 5 main services, have 5 logos, which need to be neatly displayed vertically on the left hand edge (along with the text Surveys, Rewards, Competitions, Games, Charity near each, perhaps just to the right of it). I will include the existing icons here - https://www.livetribe.com/ilink/pms_client/tribe_v3/login/FACEBOOK_AD

The Logo of our website also needs to be present (LiveTribe Noble Causes) which I can attach as well. Doesn't need to dominate the entire banner, just large enough where it can be read clearly and recognised. 

The charity we are supporting this month is a park that cares for sick and injured baby wombats. Would like them featured in the banner too. 
Could the background for the banner perhaps be a cork board? With photos of the wombats as retro Polaroid pictures pinned on like someone was collecting them. Will also include a small picture of the Wombat Rescue Logo that can be a Polaroid pic too. Perhaps the icons on the far left as well as the LiveTribe/Noble Causes Logo could also be worked into this theme? .
